mapper.select: select * from staff s, department d, post p where s.depart_id = d.id and s.post_id = p.id;

select *,DATE_FORMAT(s.startdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as startdate1 ,DATE_FORMAT(s.enddate,'%Y-%m-%d') as enddate1 from staff s, department d, post p where s.depart_id = d.id and s.post_id = p.id and s.status = '转正';

select *,DATE_FORMAT(s.startdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as startdate1 ,DATE_FORMAT(s.enddate,'%Y-%m-%d') as enddate1 from staff s, department d, post p where s.depart_id = d.id and s.post_id = p.id and s.startdate IS NOT NULL and s.enddate IS NOT NULL ;
